name: Waero - Artist Style
description:
Waero - Artist Style 🎨

This LoRA is trained on a specific artstyle of Waero known for his great Spine 2D animations , you can check out their creations on Pixiv or Twitter [contains explicit content].

Usage Tips :

  • regular use is at the weight of 0.9 to 1.2 .

  • No need for activation word but adding waerostyleto the prompt will force the image elements toward subjects (NSFW) covered by the artist , and also gives the LoRA a bit more influence but might break other LoRAs.

  • works real good with fantasy themed outfits

Samples settings :

  • Checkpoints: AOM2, Anything V4.5

  • Steps : 24-26

  • Sampler : DPM++ 2M,

  • ClipSkip : 2

have fun and consider rating ⭐
